excerpt: "Salim Mehmood finds it difficult to park his car in the narrow space of his apartment’s congested lotin Hyderabad Colony in Karachi. A few times he even hit a neighbor’s car and had to pay for the break-light and endure the wrath of his elder brother for scratches to their own car doors."
